#summary Sample applications distributed with the Visualization API

= Visualization Library Examples =

For a full list of visualizations with GWT wrappers you can refer to the [http://code.google.com/apis/visualization/documentation/gallery.html Google Visualization Gallery]. Below are some sample applications built using the Visualization API with GWT that are include as examples in the distribution.

This is a simple example of how to use a visualization in the API.
